meanings.definition: Relating to or affecting the senses rather than the intellect.
meanings.sent1: The soft, sensuous music filled the room with a calming feeling.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sensuous experience of walking barefoot on the sandy beach.
meanings.sent3: The sensuous aroma of freshly baked cookies made everyone in the house hungry.
meanings.sent4: The artist used sensuous colors to create a vibrant and lively painting.
meanings.sent5: The sensuous touch of the velvet fabric was incredibly soothing.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or given to the indulgence of the senses.
meanings.sent1: The luxurious spa offered a sensuous massage that relaxed all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a sensuous meal that delighted the taste buds of the diners.
meanings.sent3: The sensuous display of fireworks lit up the night sky with colorful bursts.
meanings.sent4: Her sensuous dance moves captivated the audience with their grace and beauty.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a sensuous paradise, filled with fragrant flowers and ripe fruits.
